subject: Add code standards, prohibitions, and quick reference to CLAUDE.md
body:
Cherry-pick useful guardrails from a proposed CLAUDE.md template:
- Code Standards: organization limits, decision docs, cleanup rules, quality checks, UX rules
- Prohibitions: explicit "never" list for common AI mistakes
- Quick Reference: filled-in project config for fast lookup
- Communication style added to AI Notes

https://claude.ai/code/session_01EKjReTMSAX1XsGEtZxhQuf
title: Add code standards, prohibitions, and quick reference to CLAUDE.md
